markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Cold Minded](/Feats.aspx?ID=3982) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Nagaji" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=359" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 48

</column>

---

The subtle strands of beguiling magic leave little impression on your mind. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60) effects, and whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
name: Cold Minded

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 1" pfs="Standard" > Cold Minded Source Impossible Lands pg. 48 --- The subtle strands of beguiling magic leave little impression on your mind. You gain a +1 circumstance bonus to saving throws against emotion effects, and whenever you roll a success on a saving throw against an emotion effect, you get a critical success instead.
